ygData.subject: RE: Genni?
ygData.msgSnippet: I just did it last night... I have her 55pp, even though she stresses 550 gold ( the element of fire - or some such nonsense), and it worked just fine. Desmei
ygData.messageBody:
I just did it last night... I have her 55pp, even though she stresses 550
gold ("the element of fire" - or some such nonsense), and it worked just
fine.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 1:46 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Genni?
>
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> GENNI RETURNS!
> From what I hear Genni has returned to most servers in the
> Temple of Solusek
> Ro. This means you can now purchase Fire Opals again. The
> trick is she loves
> gold. You have to pay her 550 Gold Pieces, not 55 pp.
>
> Anyone know if this is true before I head that way with
> nothing but plat in
> me pockets?
>
> Kitasi
>
